'''libdvdcss''' (or '''libdvdcss2''' in some repositories) is a [[free software|free]] [[software library]] for accessing and unscrambling [[DVD]]s encrypted with the [[Content Scramble System]] (CSS). libdvdcss is part of the [[VideoLAN]] project and is used by [[VLC media player]] and other [[DVD player]] software such as [[Ogle DVD Player|Ogle]], [[xine]]-based players and [[MPlayer]].
+
'''libdvdcss''' (or '''libdvdcss2''' in some repositories) is a [[free software|free]] [[software library]] for accessing and unscrambling [[DVD]]s encrypted with the [[Content Scramble System|Content Scramble System (CSS)]]. libdvdcss is part of the [[VideoLAN]] project and is used by [[VLC media player]] and other [[DVD player]] software such as [[Ogle DVD Player|Ogle]], [[xine]]-based players and [[MPlayer]].
libdvdcss is designed to be platform independent, with versions for [[Linux]], [[Microsoft Windows]], [[Mac OS X]], [[BeOS]], [[BSD]] and [[Solaris (operating system)|Solaris]].
libdvdcss is designed to be platform independent, with versions for [[Linux]], [[Microsoft Windows]], [[Mac OS X]], [[BeOS]], [[BSD]] and [[Solaris (operating system)|Solaris]].
